name: near-runtime
description: Mock Near Runtime for integration testing.
author: Willem Wyndham <willem@nearprotocol.com>

scripts.build: yarn asb ../assembly/__tests__/sentences.ts && yarn asb ../assembly/__tests__/words.ts && yarn asb ../assembly/__tests__/avlTreeContract.ts && ../node_modules/.bin/asc ../assembly/__tests__/empty.ts --target debug -o build/debug/empty.wat
